elements.name: TC-7 Verify the filtering of product in alphabetical order.

steps.name: I launch the portal
I logged into the portal successfully with username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce"
I click on the filter icon and select the option "Name (A to Z)"
I verify that the productnames are sorted alphabetically in "ascending" order
I click on the filter icon and select the option "Name (Z to A)"
I verify that the productnames are sorted alphabetically in "descending" order

elements.name: TC-8 Verify the filtering of product in price order.

steps.name: I launch the portal
I logged into the portal successfully with username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce"
I click on the filter icon and select the option "Price (low to high)"
I verify that the product prices are sorted in "ascending" order
I click on the filter icon and select the option "Price (high to low)"
I verify that the product prices are sorted in "descending" order

elements.name: TC-2 Verify that locked user is restricted from login.

steps.name: I launch the portal
I provided username "locked_out_user" and password "secret_sauce"
I click on login button
I verify login is not successful
I verify that error message "Epic sadface: Sorry, this user has been locked out." is displayed to show the login failure

elements.name: TC-3 Verify that invalid user is restricted from login.

steps.name: I launch the portal
I provided username "test" and password "secret_sauce"
I click on login button
I verify login is not successful
I verify that error message "Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service" is displayed to show the login failure

elements.name: TC-9 Verify that no of items in cart is updated when adding or removing product from product page.

steps.name: I launch the portal
I logged into the portal successfully with username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce"
I added three products to the cart
I verify that items in cart is "3"
I removed two products from the cart
I verify that items in cart is "1"

elements.name: TC-10 Verify that no of items in cart is updated when adding or removing product from cart page.

steps.name: I launch the portal
I logged into the portal successfully with username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce"
I added three products to the cart
I verify that items in cart is "3"
I click on the cart icon
I removed two products from the cart
I verify that items in cart is "1"

elements.name: TC-12 Verify that no of items in cart is correct through the checkout process.

steps.name: I launch the portal
I logged into the portal successfully with username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce"
I added three products to the cart
I verify that items in cart is "3"
I click on the cart icon
I verify that items in cart is "3"
I proceed to checkout
I verify that items in cart is "3"
I entered checkout details
I continued checkout
I verify that items in cart is "3"
I completed checkout
I verify that cart is empty

elements.name: TC-13 Verify that correct products are added to the cart

steps.name: I launch the portal
I logged into the portal successfully with username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce"
I added three products to the cart
I verify that items in cart is "3"
I click on the cart icon
I verify that correct products added to the cart

elements.name: TC-14 Verify the cancellation of checkout from Your information page and overview page

steps.name: I launch the portal
I logged into the portal successfully with username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce"
I added three products to the cart
I click on the cart icon
I proceed to checkout
I entered checkout details
I cancel the checkout
I verify that page is redirected to your cart page
I proceed to checkout
I entered checkout details
I continued checkout
I cancel the checkout
I verify that page is redirected to product page

elements.name: TC-15 Verify that the price calculated at the checkout is the sum of the product prices added to the cart

steps.name: I launch the portal
I logged into the portal successfully with username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce"
I added three products to the cart
I click on the cart icon
I proceed to checkout
I entered checkout details
I continued checkout
I verify that the item total is the sum of the products prices added to the cart

elements.name: TC-4 Verify the sidebar option avaialable under the burger menu.

steps.name: I launch the portal
I logged into the portal successfully with username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce"
I click on the burger menu on the top left corner
I verify the functionality of All Items, About, Logout and Reset App state

elements.name: TC-5 Verify that side bar is closed when clicking on the cross icon to close the burger menu.

steps.name: I launch the portal
I logged into the portal successfully with username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce"
I click on the burger menu on the top left corner
I click on the cross icon to close the burger menu
I verify that All Items, About, Logout and Reset App state is not listed

I click on the burger menu on the top left corner
I verify that All Items, About, Logout and Reset App state is listed
I proceed to checkout
I click on the burger menu on the top left corner
I verify that All Items, About, Logout and Reset App state is listed

I continued checkout
I click on the burger menu on the top left corner
